entries.meaning: One who or that which brightens.
examples: Country air in the fields, or in gardens, when breathed at proper hours, is an excellent bracer of the nerves, and a sure brightener of the complexion.

entries.meaning: A chemical agent that absorbs ultraviolet and violet light and re-emits blue light by fluorescence, used to make fabric or paper look whiter.
(metallurgy) Any substance added to an electrolytic bath to yield a brighter electroplated surface.
